## DO NOT EDIT THIS FILE, UNLESS YOU KNOW WHAT YOU ARE DOING! ##
##                                                            ##
################################################################

[ EMERC | ELGCY ]		[ PlayerData ]			<string>	Pilot Name 							(string)
[ EMERC | ELGCY ]		[ PlayerShipData ]		<string>	Fuel 								(integer, <Read as string, as this values are two integers separated by an "/" ~Scavenger4711>)
[ EMERC | ELGCY ]		[ PlayerData ]			<string>	Cash 								(string, includes commas)
[ EMERC | ELGCY ]		[ PlayerShipData ]		<string>	Cargo Bay 1 						(string, cargo type and number, or will display 'Empty' if nothing)
[ EMERC | ELGCY ]		[ PlayerShipData ]		<string>	Cargo Bay 2
[ EMERC | ELGCY ]		[ PlayerShipData ]		<string>	Cargo Bay 3
[ EMERC | ELGCY ]		[ PlayerShipData ]		<string>	Cargo Bay 4
